flawed_nl_solution:
If Yola currently weighs 220 pounds, then Wanda, who weighs 30 pounds more than Yola, weighs 220+30 = <<220+30=520>>520 pounds.
Wanda also weighs 80 pounds more than Yola did 2 years ago, meaning Yola weighed 520-80=<<520-80=440>>440 pounds 2 years ago.
#### 440

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 250, not 520. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
